name: sdk/v0.14.3
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at release/sdk/v0.14.3 -->

## What's Changed
* C++: Fix memory leak in generic_client allocate_message by @MatthewDHarrison in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/667
* Python: expose Context.default in types & docs by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/676
* Docs: Add note to CameraCalibration that we do not support Tx and Ty values by @defunctzombie in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/665
* Docs: improve C++ docs for log timestamps by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/674
* Docs: Fix bayer CFA typo by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/678

## New Contributors
* @clalancette made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/671
* @MatthewDHarrison made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/667

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/compare/sdk/v0.14.2...sdk/v0.14.3

name: ros-v3.2.1
body:
## What's Changed

### Foxglove Bridge
* Fix memory leak in generic_client allocate_message by @MatthewDHarrison in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/667
* Update the workaround to find the service typesupport handle. by @clalancette in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/673

## New Contributors
* @clalancette made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/671
* @MatthewDHarrison made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/667

name: ros-v3.2.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Foxglove Bridge
* Rewrite of foxglove_bridge to use the Foxglove SDK (various)
* fix errors on bridge shutdown (`#640 <https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/issues/640>`_)

### foxglove_msgs
* Add RawAudio schema
* Add generated schema types for C++
* Add Kannala-Brandt distortion model to CameraCalibration
* Remove ImageMarkerArray schema

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/compare/sdk/v0.14.2...ros-v3.2.0

name: sdk/v0.10.0
body:
This release contains potentially breaking changes:

- If you implement a Parameter server, any "numeric" `ParameterValue`s should be updated to float64s or integers, to improve integration with the Foxglove app
- In C++, if you use subscription callbacks, an additional argument with client metadata is added to the interface
- In C++, the Timestamp and Duration schemas moved from the `foxglove` namespace to `foxglove::schemas`

## What's Changed

* Breaking: Introduce explicit integer Parameter type by @ericmlujan in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/542
* Fix race where on_subscribe callback is called before channel is registered with a context by @ericmlujan in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/533
* Do not send deleted/non-existent params to clients by @ericmlujan in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/545

### Python

* Python: add session_id option to start_server by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/532

### C++

* Breaking: Move Timestamp and Duration to schemas namespace by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/544
* Breaking: Thread through the client ID to the subscribe/unsubscribe callbacks for WebSocket server by @ericmlujan in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/515
* Use original `tl` namespace for expected by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/543
* Fix template type issue by @jlack1987 in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/538

## New Contributors
* @bennetthardwick made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/529
* @msadowski made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/530
* @jlack1987 made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/538

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/compare/sdk/v0.9.1...sdk/v0.10.0

name: sdk/v0.9.1
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at release/sdk/v0.9.1 -->

## What's Changed

* Don't unadvertise a channel if an error prevented it from being advertised by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/520
* Only track channels that were actually advertised in ConnectedClient::channels by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/523

### Python

* Expose metadata in channel constructors by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/505

### C++

* Include missing `<vector>` by @paulsohn in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/506
* Fix GCC build by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/516

## New Contributors
* @paulsohn made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/506
* @ericmlujan made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/509
* @nthiad made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/460

name: sdk/v0.8.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at release/sdk/v0.8.0 -->

## What's Changed
* Advertise SDK library version over websocket by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/427
* Add websocket server method to get app URL by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/439
* 
### Python
* Update python example by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/401
* Add simple example of writing RawAudio messages to an mcap. by @nidanin in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/431
* Add note to docs that schema classes are immutable and don't provide getters and setters by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/437
* Add Message.get_schema() and various channel getters by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/441

### Rust
* Add shutdown handle for websocket server by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/409
* Use underscores in crate names by @amacneil in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/429
* Add `foxglove::Encode` derive macro by @defunctzombie in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/324
* Add features for derive, lz4, schemars, zstd by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/433
* Accept u64, Timestamp, SystemTime, and DateTime as log timestamps by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/435

### C++
* Add readability-identifier-naming rules by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/392
* Catch callback exceptions by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/404
* Document C++ interface by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/407
* Fix deleted operator warnings for Channel by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/406
* Generate C++ documentation in CI by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/410
* Provide an interface to set the level of SDK stderr logging by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/405
* Add support for websocket parameters by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/383
* Add support for websocket parameter subscriptions by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/386
* Use ccache, where available by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/411
* Add support for services by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/397
* Add support for fetch asset handler by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/403
* Convince miri that FoxgloveStringBuf is safe by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/416
* Make context the first callback argument by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/417
* Add support for broadcasting time by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/420
* Add websocket clear session and publish status by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/421
* Improve C++ documentation; rework docs publishing by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/418
* Add foxglove schemas for C++ by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/413
* Don't use default values from schemas for C++ by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/436
* Add docs about thread-safety to C++ API by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/432
* Add a c++ example using the typed channels and foxglove by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/438

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/compare/sdk/v0.7.1...sdk/v0.8.0

name: sdk/v0.7.0
body:
## What's Changed

* Add RawAudio schema by @nidanin in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/373
* Support channels with a shared topic by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/385
* Parameter::string() should not produce a byte array by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/381
* String parameters must not be base64-encoded by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/382

### Python

* **Deprecation**: MCAPWriter moved to the foxglove.mcap module
* Add MCAP write options by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/374
* Improved websocket parameters by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/389

### Rust

* **Breaking**: Some channel-building interfaces now return a channel instead of a result.

### C++

* Add connection graph by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/379
* Remove usage of CStr by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/371

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/compare/sdk/v0.6.2...sdk/v0.7.0

name: sdk/v0.6.0
body:
## What's Changed

### All

* Remove publish_time and sequence from metadata options by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/358
* Doc updates by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/367
* Batch websocket channel advertisements by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/365

### Rust

* rust: Add documentation for chrono feature by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/352
* rust: Fix timestamp overflow documentation by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/351
* rust: Minor doc cleanup by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/353
* rust: Reject websocket clients after Server::stop by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/361
* rust: Remove WebSocketServerBlockingHandle by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/362


### Python

* python: Allow logging on schemaless channels by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/349
* python: Fix library annotations by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/366
* python: Fix default schema names; provide topic and schema getters by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/368
* python: Fix channel interface to provide ID by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/370

### C++

* C/C++: Add artifacts to release assets by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/369

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/compare/sdk/v0.5.0...sdk/v0.6.0

name: sdk/v0.5.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at release/sdk/v0.5.0 -->

## What's Changed

### All
* websocket: don't send msg for empty add_services call by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/326
* Optimize buffering in log_to_sinks by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/330
* Add Timestamp::now() convenience method by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/333
* Set library version with SDK language by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/288
* Call `on_unsubscribe` when client disconnects by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/338
* Fail WS handshake if client doesn't request any subprotocol by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/347

### Rust
* rust: Expose ChannelId struct by @achim-k in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/319
* rust: Expose ChannelId::new by @achim-k in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/325
* rust: Rename Channel->RawChannel, TypedChannel->Channel by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/315
* rust: Clarify docs for Duration::new by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/328
* rust: Set MSRV to 1.83.0 by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/327
* rust: Replace static_channel! with LazyChannel by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/331
* rust: Add Channel::close by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/334
* rust: Make Context public, add LazyContext by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/335
* Add rust high level log! macro - type-safe logging without channels by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/311
* rust: Ensure feature-flagged items are documented by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/344
* rust: Document buffering behavior by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/341
* Re-export mcap and bytes dependencies by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/340
* Move websocket support into a feature (enabled by default) by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/342

### Python
* fix typo by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/323
* python: Channel.close() should remove channel from context by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/329
* Bump pyo3 & pyo3-log by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/337
* Fix up python docs by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/339
* python: use published SDK for examples by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/314

### C/C++
* Fix lifetime issues by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/321
* Fix build errors with cmake by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/332
* Add prebuilt C library for iOS & simulator by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/322

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/compare/sdk/v0.4.1...sdk/v0.5.0

name: sdk/v0.4.1
body:

## What's Changed
* Preserve schema name in encodings to fix GeoJSON by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/317

name: sdk/v0.4.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at release/sdk/v0.4.0 -->

## What's Changed

### All
* Support schemaless channels over websocket by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/283
* Create 'quickstart' examples by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/307

### Python
* python: Don't override message_schema for json schemas by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/271
* python: organize websocket code into submodule by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/276
* python: update & fix examples by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/278
* python: migrate to pytest in sdk by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/289
* python: fix stub definitions for typed channel logging by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/309
* python: improve high-level log API  by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/303
* python: fix up the live viz example by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/312
* python: add benchmark tests by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/296
* python: Hide _foxglove_py imports where possible by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/310

### Rust
* rust: Fix flakey test by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/268
* rust: Demote &Arc<Channel> to &Channel by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/269
* rust: Use Bytes instead of Vec<u8> in protobufs by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/272
* rust: Wrap Context in Arc<> by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/280
* rust: Add SinkId for identifying sinks by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/290
* rust: Plumb Context through Sink builders by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/291
* rust: Rename LogContext->Context, LogSink->Sink by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/279
* rust: Move client-publish example by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/297
* rust: Add subscription manager by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/281
* rust: Use subscription manager by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/292
* rust: Manage websocket channel subscriptions dynamically by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/293
* rust: Make channel fields private by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/299
* rust: Remove arbitrary sleeps from tests by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/298
* rust: Fix websocket service schema encoding by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/304
* rust: Actually fix websocket service schema encoding by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/308
* rust: Miscellaneous tidying by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/306
* rust: Cope with buggy websocket service/asset handlers by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/305
* rust: Remove ClientChannelView by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/286
* rust: Change ClientChannel schema data to binary; unify base64 handling by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/285

### C/C++
_Note: C and C++ support is in early development and not yet ready for testing._
* C/C++: add basic channel wrapper and log method by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/267
* C/C++: add server callbacks for on_un/subscribe by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/274
* C/C++: run sanitizers in CI by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/282
* C/C++: client publishing support by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/287
* C/C++: address review comments from client publishing by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/302
* C/C++ Add mcap writer by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/295

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/compare/sdk/v0.3.0...sdk/v0.4.0

name: sdk/v0.3.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at release/sdk/v0.3.0 -->

## What's Changed

### Python

* python: improve documentation and auto-generate api docs by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/223
* python: broadcast time to clients by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/224
* python: Add a server listener that handles client message callbacks by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/226
* python: support status publishing on server by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/227
* python: Add metadata to log() by @amacneil in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/232
* python: Add isort to toolchain by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/236
* python: publish docs to gh pages by @sofuture in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/228
* python: Unified open_mcap call by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/235
* python: implement parameters on server listener by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/231
* Support parameter subscriptions by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/238
* python: implement additional ServerListener callbacks by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/240
* python: Add support for websocket services by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/239
* rust, python: Pass client ID for service callback in Request by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/244
* python: Update logging handling and level support by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/243
* python: Add support for adding & removing services by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/245
* python: add close method to channels by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/250
* python: improve documentation by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/254
* python: Move Duration and Timestamp out of codegen by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/258
* python: support connection graph by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/262
* python: Consolidate schema types by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/260
* python: support asset serving by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/259
* python: Add conversions for Duration and Timestamp by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/263

### Rust

* rust: inline definitions for derived schemas by @bryfox in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/222
* rust: Add support for websocket services by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/213
* rust: Support the rest of parameter protocol by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/212
* rust: Don't create a runtime during shutdown_runtime by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/241
* rust, python: Pass client ID for service callback in Request by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/244
* rust: Don't expose websocket service IDs by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/242
* rust: Wrap Duration and Timestamp schemas by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/247
* rust: ws server connection graph support by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/237
* rust: Improve service handler wrappers by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/249
* rust: ws server asset protocol by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/229
* rust: Enable a subset of clippy::pedantic lints by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/256
* rust: Disconnect slow client when control plane fills up by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/261
* rust, cpp: Expose server port by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/255
* rust: Remove redundant semaphore test by @gasmith in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/264

### C / C++

_Note: C and C++ support is in early development and not yet ready for testing._

* cpp: C++ setup by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/246
* cpp: Add COLCON_IGNORE to keep ros build farm happy by @amacneil in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/266
* rust, cpp: Expose server port by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/255

## New Contributors
* @sofuture made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/pull/228

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/foxglove/foxglove-sdk/compare/sdk/v0.2.1...sdk/v0.3.0
